subject: Re: [sugar] Getting sugar running on a Mac
body:
On Apr 10, 2007, at 17:36 , Follower wrote:

> Steven W Riggins wrote:
>> I've tried Q (Qemu) and parallels.  385 just crashes the parallels VM
>> and the live images are "not bootable" according to Q.
> Are you using this:
>
>
>  STABLE-BUILD/devel_ext3/olpc-redhat-stream-development- 
> build-385-20070406_2314-devel_ext3.img.bz2>
>

Stable build 368 crashed Parallels for me. The stable build before  
that (303) worked. Haven't tried 385 yet.

- Bert -
